item.description:
*****It will be actually "Latin Night" at the Samba Bar and Grill on Friday, and Tremeterra will be performing a samba show from 11pm to midnight. The rest of the night is going to be a dj salsa/latin music.*****

***The cover charge before 10:30pm is $10 and $15 afterwards.****
***However, we are meeting really early 8pm, there is a good chance that they will not be collecting the cover charge so early, however I can not make that guarantee.****




If you enjoyed or missed the Tremeterra show at Ryles on Friday, June 13th.
This is your chance to enjoy them again on Friday, June 27th.
It is a very high energy event. The show includes Afro-Brazilian music and dance performances.

The show will take place at the Samba Bar and Grill Restaurant in Somerville.

The plan is to meet at 8 PM for informal Portuguese conversation.
There is no pressure to speak completely in Portuguese.
You can get comfortable by just listening then jump in the conversation when you're ready.

Please bring enough cash to pay for your meal, drinks, tip, and tax.
Then enjoy the Samba Tremeterra link show which should begin by 9:30 PM.

For Tremeterra music and video clips, see the following sites:

http://sambatremeterr...

http://tuneyourworld....

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Tremeterra at The Samba Bar and Grill
